full_text:
Page 316
To: (b(6); (b)(7)(C) (USANYS) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usa.doj.gov>
From: (b(6); (b)(7)(C) (USANYS) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usa.doj.gov>
Subject: Re: Automatic reply: Epstein update
FYI:
The BOP just informed us that Epstein is being taken by ambulance to the hospital from another apparent suicide attempt- no other information was provided.
They will update us as more info becomes available.
On Aug 10, 2019, at 7:26 AM (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USANYS) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usa.doj.gov> wrote:
I will be out of the office on vacation until Monday, August 12th. Although I will have access to email during my absence, my responses may be delayed. For urgent matters, please contact the other AUSA(s) on the case, or AUSA (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov at 212-637-(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
DOJ-OGR-00024851

text_blocks.content: Subject: Re: Automatic reply: Epstein update
The BOP just informed us that Epstein is being taken by ambulance to the hospital from another apparent suicide attempt- no other information was provided.
They will update us as more info becomes available.

I will be out of the office on vacation until Monday, August 12th. Although I will have access to email during my absence, my responses may be delayed. For urgent matters, please contact the other AUSA(s) on the case, or AUSA (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov at 212-637-(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

additional_notes: The document contains redactions in the form of (b)(6); (b)(7)(C), indicating that certain information has been withheld for privacy or security reasons.
